mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM sys_rbac_menu ali INNER JOIN sys_rbac_system srs ON srs.system_id = ali.system_id WHERE ali.del_flag = 0 AND ali.menu_status = 1 AND srs.del_flag = 0
AND srs.system_code IN
#{item}
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM sys_rbac_menu WHERE menu_id IN
#{item}
mapper.update:
UPDATE sys_rbac_menu
del_flag = 1, unique_help = menu_id,
WHERE menu_id IN
#{item}
